articles.title: OnePlus 11: Early global model benchmark results highlight below-par multi-core performance - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: The OnePlus 11 is moving closer to a global release, with the device expected to launch outside China next month. In the meantime, early benchmark results show the OnePlus 11 is unable to maximise the multi-core potential of the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chipset. Th…

articles.description: Mojang released a new trailer for their Minecraft Marketplace in Bedrock Edition on January 12, 2022, which promotes all the fresh and exciting content being added to the Marketplace.
